Name: Phantom Rose
About the game: Phantom Rose is a roguelike deckbuilding card game. Fight and collect powerful cards as Reina, a maid exploring a mansion ravaged by evil creatures. ◆ A Roguelike Card Adventure Build your card deck and make careful decisions while you explore as each death may be permanent. ◆ Manage Your Deck There's no luck-based card draw during battle. Instead, manage your card's cooldown to defeat your foe swiftly and efficiently. ◆ Defeat and Collect Collect over 100+ cards and powerful items by defeating phantoms & rescuing other maids in distress ◆ Explore Through Dangers Venture through areas of interest, danger, and place of safety to reach and defeat the crown phantoms for large rewards
